name: Mommie Beerest
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Michael Price, Daniel Chun (staff writer)
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: Homer gives Moe an enormous amount of money so he doesn't have to close down.
